name: Damier Collarless Workwear Cotton Jacket
shortDescription: This cotton workwear jacket from the Fall-Winter 2024 Show revisits Pharrell Williams’ iconic collarless silhouette. Constructed from a beige Damier jacquard incorporating ‘L.Vuitton Marque déposée’ signatures, it is lined with the clothing collection’s standout Damier Buffalo plaid. Turquoise blue buttons and a leather LV Saddle patch embellish this utilitarian yet chic design, which can be paired with matching trousers.
detailedDescription:
• 100% cotton
  • Beige
  • Regular fit
  • Damier jacquard incorporating ‘L.Vuitton Marque déposée’ signatures
  • 4 front patch pockets
  • Damier Buffalo flannel lining
  • Leather LV Saddle patch on lower left pocket
  • Turquoise Blue buttons
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professional dry cleaning in hydrocarbons with KWL
  • Dry clean gently
  • Dry clean inside out in a net
  • Iron inside out with fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To maintain the quality of your Louis Vuitton product, we recommend that you follow the care instructions:

name: Chic Collarless Baby Llama and Wool Blend Jacket
shortDescription: This chic white jacket revisits the iconic collarless silhouette first introduced by Pharrell Williams in the Spring-Summer 2024 Show. It is tailored with a sophisticated baby llama and wool blend bouclette and adorned with the Fall-Winter 2024 Show’s Western-inspired turquoise blue buttons and studs. With its minimalist workwear-inspired construction, this summery clothing piece can be dressed up or down, with tailored or denim trousers.
detailedDescription:
• 32% cotton, 31% viscose, 18% wool, 10% llama hair, 9% polyamide
  • White
  • Regular fit
  • Turquoise Blue buttons and rivets
  • Made in Italy

name: Single-Breasted Nubuck Leather Jacket
shortDescription: This elegant single-breasted jacket is tailored in soft nubuck leather with details inspired by the American Far West, such as a Western yoke and flap pockets, vertical piped pockets on the chest ornamented with Monogram Flower embroidery and ornamental turquoise blue buttons. With its neutral brown tones, this versatile piece from the Fall-Winter 2024 Show complements both timeless and casual looks.
detailedDescription:
• 100% calf leather
  • Brown
  • Classic tailored fit
  • Monogram Flower embroidery on chest pocket entry
  • Western-style yoke front and back
  • 2 vertical piped chest pockets
  • 2 flap pockets on the front with a Western cut
  • Turquoise Blue buttons on central closure and cuffs
  • Single rear vent
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean
  • Dry clean by leather specialist only
panelInformations.introduction: To maintain the quality of your Louis Vuitton product, we recommend that you follow the care instructions:

name: Wool Blanket Waistcoat
shortDescription: This cream wool waistcoat is a key piece from the Fall-Winter 2024 Show’s Far West fantasy. Fusing the House’s savoir-faire with American visual traditions, the responsibly sourced double face wool is crafted with a felted floral motif in soft brown tones. Turquoise blue buttons complete this elegant clothing piece, which can be worn over a shirt for a touch of dandy Western attitude.
detailedDescription:
• 100% wool
  • Vanilla 
  • Regular fit
  • Louis Vuitton signature within the floral motif
  • Double face wool with felted needle punch embroidery
  • Turquoise Blue buttons
  • Made in Italy

name: Embroidered Double-Breasted Cotton Chambray Jacket
shortDescription: This sharply tailored washed denim jacket embraces the dandy Western aesthetic that is a key theme of the Fall-Winter 2024 Show. The cropped double-breasted silhouette is embellished with sequin-embroidered floral patches and turquoise blue buttons, while discreet embroidered Monogram Flower details embellish the piped horizontal pockets. An embroidered ‘Marque L.Vuitton déposée’ label adds a signature touch to the back.
detailedDescription:
• 100% cotton
  • Indigo Blue
  • Cropped fit
  • Piped pockets with embroidered Monogram Flower details
  • Embroidered ‘Marque L.Vuitton déposée’ label on the back
  • Double-breasted
  • Peak lapel
  • Embroidered patches with sequins
  • Turquoise Blue buttons
  • Washed and lived-in effect

name: Damier Collarless Tweed Jacket
shortDescription: This chic collarless jacket stands out with the Fall-Winter 2024 Show’s iconic Damier Buffalo tweed inspired by the American West. The all-over motif reinvents the heritage Louis Vuitton signature in a sophisticated red and black plaid, which is woven into wool bouclé fabric for a dressed up look. Turquoise blue buttons and studs add dandy accents to the workwear-inspired clothing silhouette, which can complete more formal looks.
detailedDescription:
• 48% polyamide, 28% cotton, 24% wool
  • Red Plaid
  • Regular fit
  • Damier Buffalo red and black plaid tweed
  • 3 curved patch pockets, including 1 on the chest
  • Turquoise Blue buttons on closure and cuffs
  • Turquoise Blue rivets on pockets
  • Lined
  • Made in Italy

name: Collarless Cotton Workwear Jacket
shortDescription: This elegant jacket revisits the iconic collarless silhouette first introduced by Pharrell Williams in his debut Spring-Summer 2024 Collection. This piece is crafted from a Monogram cotton jacquard overprinted with a playful Western motif from the Fall-Winter 2024 Show. It is tailored with a Western yoke at the back, while pearl-effect buttons add a chic sartorial twist.

  • Multicoloured
  • Straight fit
  • Monogram Far West jacquard overprinted with far west motif

name: Jacquard Double Face Wool Blanket Waistcoat
shortDescription: This jacquard wool waistcoat from the Fall-Winter 2024 Show is embellished with a Western-inspired Geo Rodeo motif incorporating Monogram details. Contrasting graphic bands, featuring micro Damier elements, run down the centre front and back, while turquoise blue buttons add a dandy twist. This clothing piece complements both casual and elegant looks and has a matching blanket coat for a runway look.

• 72% wool, 18% polyamide, 10% cotton
  • Rifle Green
  • Regular fit
  • Geo Rodeo jacquard

name: Double-Breasted Silk And Cotton Blend Tailored Jacket
shortDescription: This sharply tailored double-breasted jacket is inspired by this collection’s maritime aesthetics and is perfect for cocktails with the captain. It is crafted from a luxurious blend of silk and cotton in elegant cream tones with a lustrous all-over LV Fishnet jacquard. Pearl-effect buttons add a sophisticated dandy twist. Half-lined for warm weather, this piece makes a sophisticated suit with matching flared trousers.
detailedDescription:
• 60% cotton, 40% silk
  • Ecru White
  • Regular fit
  • LV Fishnet jacquard
  • Peak lapel
  • Pearl-effect buttons with golden setting
  • Half-lined
  • Made in Italy

name: Double-Breasted Wool And Cotton Blend Tailored Jacket
shortDescription: This chic black double-breasted jacket is tailored in a wrinkle-resistant wool and cotton blend crepe, making it easy to pack for elegant summer events. Taking inspiration from the Louis Vuitton 37th America’s Cup, it has gold-finished buttons on the front and on the cuffs, while a tricolour rubber Gaston patch adorns the back. Matching flared trousers make a sophisticated contemporary suit.
detailedDescription:
• 56% wool, 44% cotton
  • Black
  • Regular fit
  • Rubber patch with Gaston signature on the back
  • LV Cup metal buttons with gold finish
  • LV Rope buttons on cuffs with enamel Monogram Flower details

  • Semi-lined
  • Made in Italy

shortDescription: This tailored black waistcoat draws on the Far West inspirations of the Fall-Winter 2024 Show, with Western-style curved piped pockets and turquoise blue snap buttons topped with a jewel-like Monogram Flower for a dandy sartorial twist. Crafted from fine responsibly sourced wool and mohair suiting, this versatile piece can be mixed and matched with a corresponding jacket, shorts and trousers.

Offering a contemporary take on tailoring with its fluid drape, it is crafted from a soft washed chambray adorned with pearl-effect buttons for a sophisticated dandy twist. The slightly cropped silhouette is embellished with an embroidered tonal Blooming LV signature on the lapel and lined with a colourful Monogram Craggy motif. name: Monogram Wool Evening Cutaway Jacket
shortDescription: This lustrous black wool cutaway evening jacket stands out with its contemporary Monogram Celebration motif. This festive signature in a tonal flock features tiny pixellated Monogram elements, which, when viewed from a distance, coalesce to suggest a Monogram on a larger scale. Embroidered scattered sequins add further sophistication to this chic clothing piece, which has matching trousers for a distinctive evening look.

panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :

name: Single-Breasted Wool School Blazer
shortDescription: This black wool blazer from the Spring-Summer 2024 Show brings an elegant sartorial twist to the men's silhouette. The classic tailored jacket is ennobled with a pearl-embroidered ‘Marque L. Vuitton déposée’ signature on the chest pocket, while contrasting tape on the collar, hems and cuffs add a sophisticated finishing touch.
detailedDescription:
• 100% certified wool
  • Black
  • Regular fit
  • ‘Marque L. Vuitton déposée’ hand-embroidered with pearls on the chest pocket
  • Monogram Flower ornamentation on the buttons
  • Contrasting tape on the collar, hem and sleeves
  • 3-button closure
  • 3 patch pockets
  • Fully lined
  • Global Organic Textile Standard
  • Global Recycled Standard
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum soleplate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professional dry cleaning in hydrocarbons with KWL
  • Dry clean gently
  • Protect the accessories before cleaning
  • Dry clean inside out in a net

• Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C

  • Protect the accessories before cleaning
